column1: Smoque BBQ////We got a side of brisket. I've only had BBQ brisket once before at a South Carolina style BBQ place in Maryland. This brisket was UNBELIEVABLE. When ordered we were asked "sliced or chopped" we opted for sliced. The flavor of the meat
column2: the smokiness of it and the melt in your mouth tenderness was too much! The side portion of it was generous and I may be a brisket convert.
